abstract: Goldman Sachs‘s chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, has reportedly received a couple of unusual phone calls recently — and the folks doing the dialing wanted to know if rumors are true about, well, rumors.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs‘s chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, has reportedly received a couple of unusual phone calls recently — and the folks doing the dialing wanted to know if rumors are true about, well, rumors.

headline.main: Goldman Is Questioned Over Wall Street Rumors
